definition: face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: To tests the operator to say the man-machine contact surface good, simple is easy to understand.
sentences.chinese: 對實驗操作人員來說人機界面良好，簡單易懂。

sentences.english: Also the interface of this series is excellent, and the retentivity and stability is reliable.
sentences.chinese: 具有人機界面優越及保持性和穩定性可靠等特點。

sentences.english: Retrospect to the development of human computer interface.
sentences.chinese: 對人機界面的發展進行了回顧。

sentences.english: Human-machine operation, convenient and quick parameter setting.
sentences.chinese: 人機界面，參數設定方便快捷。

sentences.english: A friendly human-machine interface is provided by keyboard input and LCD module.
sentences.chinese: 鍵盤輸入及液晶顯示模塊，提供了友好的人機界面。

sentences.english: Colorful Touch Screen Control Panel, HMI interface, simple and convenient operation.
sentences.chinese: 彩色觸摸屏控制面版，人機界面，操作簡易方便。

sentences.english: Intelligent Integrated Numerical Control System, concision and vivid human and machine interface to have easy operation.
sentences.chinese: 智能簡潔人機界面使操作更加方便快捷。

sentences.english: Besides, with functions like human-computer interface and malfunction alarm, etc. , this machine is easy to be operated.
sentences.chinese: 人機界面，操作方便，自動配比，故障報警。

sentences.english: Single Chip Micro Computer that controlled the keyboard and display module provided a good human-computer interface.
sentences.chinese: 單片機控制鍵盤與顯示模塊，提供了良好的人機界面。

sentences.english: Frendly man-machine interface and convenient operation.
sentences.chinese: 人機界面友好，操作便捷。

sentences.english: Combined with integration display and control console of certain submarine, comprehensive evaluation of human machine interface is made.
sentences.chinese: 結合某型潛艇綜合顯控臺進行了人機界面的綜合評價。

sentences.english: The device was controlled with a manually operated remote display box to realize man-machine interface for controlling.
sentences.chinese: 用有線手提遠程操作顯示盒實現人機界面操作。
